textAfterTable: 9 John E. Neilson Extraman 39 Steam Boat Captain 170 Fourth St. 10 C. N. McIntyre Extraman 31 Trimmer 170 Fourth St. Number of alarms responded to: Bell--84, Telephone--39, Still--16. Hours in service: 110. Transfers: C. Anderson to driver of Truck 1; Wm. Harrow to driver of Chemical 1; A. E. Austin to Foreman of Hose 1. Resignations: Bert Eides, C. Marceil, E. Heath. Inventory: 1 engine, 1 two-horse wagon, 4 horses, 2125 feet of (cotton) hose, 2 double sets of harness, 1 second-class Clapp & Jones engine and heater. Engine Co.
